messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] Birthday Calendar
messages.msgSnippet: Please disregard this message.I recieved what I thought to be a valid email asking for my birthday,when I gave it and hit send it took all of the addresse in
messages.messageBody:
Please disregard this message.I recieved what I thought to be a valid email asking for my birthday,when I gave it and hit send it took all of the addresse in my address book and sent requests as if I was asking for everyones birthday.I am so sorry and embarrassed.
I opoligize again,
Tricia

Patricia Tidmore <ptidmore1117@...> wrote:
Hi

Please click (or copy and paste) the link below and enter your birthday into my calendar. It's quick, easy and you'll be helping me out:-).

http://www.birthdayalarm.com/bd1/66047631a943233373b984487270c520749905d905

Patricia
